CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.Name = 'Expense', Budget_Item__r.Item_Budget__c, IF(TEXT(Type__c) = 'Personnel', Budget_Item__r.Wages__c, IF(TEXT(Type__c) = 'Fringe', Budget_Item__r.Fringe_Benefits__c, 0)))

CustomField.label: Budgeted Amount
